Package businessLogic.candidate

Class CandidateController

java.lang.Object
businessLogic.candidate.CandidateController
public class CandidateController extends Object
This class is responsible for managing the operations related to Candidates.

    • addCandidate

      public boolean addCandidate(String name, int age, int candidateElect, byte[] photo, String gender) throws SQLException
      Adds a new Candidate.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the candidate
      age - the age of the candidate
      candidateElect - the elect status of the candidate
      photo - the photo of the candidate
      gender - the gender of the candidate
      Returns:
      true if the candidate was added successfully, false otherwise
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database access error occurs

    • updateCandidate

      public boolean updateCandidate(int id, String name, int age, int candidateElect, byte[] photo, String gender) throws SQLException
      Updates a Candidate.
      Parameters:
      id - the id of the candidate to be updated
      name - the new name of the candidate
      age - the new age of the candidate
      candidateElect - the new elect status of the candidate
      photo - the new photo of the candidate
      gender - the new gender of the candidate
      Returns:
      true if the candidate was updated successfully, false otherwise
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database access error occurs
